channel.title: Requesting No-IP Help
channel.description: Hello, can someone please post a topic, (or reply to this) on how to configure No-IP. I have done everything in all the tuts I could find, and I always get the same error: Error Connecting to Server. Just please post a "tut" with pics on how to make your server work with No-IP, it will be greatly appreciated. And, lol, if i [b]could[/b] +rep you I would. :P

item.title: Requesting No-IP Help

item.description:

item.title: Requesting No-IP Help
item.dc:creator: @Ksu Ksu
item.description:
@Ksu wrote:

This is what I did:

Get your Ip you opened the ports on, my gateway is 192.168.1.1 but i opened it on 192.168.1.100 because it wouldnt let me open on 192.168.1.1. And on a random name in your no-ip acc put it in as the ip. I did that and it worked.

Read full topic
